name: Lilly and the Lost Lands
description:
Lilly is a resident of Lost Lands. A shattered island that has been detached from the mainland since long ago. This place is filled with dangerous traps, wild beasts and numerous platforming challenges. It's up-to you to find all 20 herbs and save Lilly's bedridden mother.

A metroidvania title inspired by the likes of old classics like "Knytt".  This is the first game that we've published. Hope everyone enjoys the game.  This game is also available on Google Play Store for those of you who are interested.

We are two student developers wishing to make a name in the gaming industry. If anyone has any queries or any projects we can take up on please email us at triwolfgamesfeedback@gmail.com , Thank you.
